attributes.review: I decided to download this app to caught up and learn more about the plans that our beloved president has for this upcoming election. However in minutes I have noticed my phone has been glitching and completely shutting down within minutes of just trying to sign up for the app. This app isn’t just useful and I’m highly disappointed in it
attributes.title: 🙉 Your Local Monkey 🙉

attributes.review: Sent this to my coworker as a little gift Bc she aborted her first kid and i was so happy for her BUT WHEN SHE OPENED THE APP IT WAS PICTURES OF A BUCK NAKED MANS DINGALINGS GRIPPING A POSTER WHICK READ “You are not welcome on this app Bc u got an abortion” !! We both found it horribly disturbing and A COMPLETE FELONY and the next day she pasted away, most likely Bc of that apps nasty hurtful words. This App Store needs to take it down immediately before it keeps murdering my coworkers! Soon there will be no one to run our company!!
attributes.title: Creepy! Killer! Hurtful!

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to show love to our 🍊orange 🍊 and then deleted the app because I started getting ghost oranges appearing in my room that said they would kill me and have the other oranges come and jump me to make sure I was dead and hide my body in my basement I was so scared so I asked tik tok what to do then I they told me to delete the app but I just couldn’t so I got jumped and killed so this is my host reviewing this deadly app.
attributes.title: Tik Tok

attributes.review: I’m constantly being kicked off the app and I was really interested to see what this orange clown plans were for 2020. It keeps spamming me asking if I wanted to turn on notifications. I can’t let my friends see that I have the app the supports a raping, racist, homophobic, dummy. Sorry 🤷‍♀️.  Anyways this app is making the App Store look terrible so you should definitely take it down.
attributes.title: Absolutely Garbage

attributes.review: This app had to be one of the most scary thing I have ever seen. This gave me nightmares and everytime i close my eyes i see it. I am now in therapy because of this app. Not only that, this app gave my phone a serious virus which led to me having to pay $700 to fix! And even after that, i had to buy a whole new phone b/c everytime i unlock my phone, i get the horrific image of the app! ✨😍🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: Virus Warning

attributes.review: This app is constantly making my phone crash no matter what I do. Even if i restart my phone or delete the app as a whole, my phone keeps crashing. Save yourself from the disappointment and pain of downloading this app unless u want to buy a new phone due to the unlimited amount of problems that this app brings.
attributes.title: The worst app i’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review: This has got to be the most disgusting app I’ve ever downloaded. 🤢 I just wanted to support our president for his second term. 🥺 As soon as I opened the app MY PRESIDENT’S NUDES POPPED UP. 😡 It wouldn’t let me scroll past it and it wouldn’t even let me exit the app. 🙀 It had a place to review the nudes, as soon as you did it would pop up even more. 😖So many different angles, but it was still a 🍤 I 100% DO NOT recommend this app. 🙅🏼‍♀️🧚🏻

this app actually took forever to download and it crashed so many times.😚 i was actually trying to look and see what trump’s plans for this election are and i was very disappointed.😌overall, im not happy with how this app made my phone react. 🖤it stated crashing over and over again and i eventually deleted the app and restarted my phone over again. 🦧it finally was fixed but i had to delete the app first. 🍊i just downloaded it again and it’s doing the same thing. 🧑🏽‍🦲this app is actually really bad. 😭maybe it just needs some updates but i’m pretty sure this app is horrible for your phone.🧜🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: genuinely terrible app

attributes.userName: big butty judy gen-z TIK TOK
attributes.review: I got this app hoping our amazing orange would give us AMAZING NEWS but no I got it and my phone would start glitching while using the app and it would start to freeze a week after and it gave my phone a VIRUS so bad that my phone wouldn’t turn on sometimes people HACKED on my phone because I gave my info to that app EVEN THO I HAVE VPN and I got SEVERAL messeges from people i don’t know and I HIGHLY say DONT GET THIS APP I HAD TO GET A NEW NUMBER NE PHONE NEW EVERYTHING
attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP

attributes.review: As much as I hate our very ✨orange✨ president, I hate this app more. I have not even opened it, because I am very scared, scared of what I might find and come across. My wife, Karen Smith is a huge trump supporter. She does many things. And she is a Trump supporter. She yells at people for doing nothing wrong,  thinks only white lives matter, and called the police on innocent African American people playing sports in a public basketball court.  💥BLM💥
attributes.title: Do not download
